author: sussman
msg: * doc/book/outline.txt:  move 'vendor branches' to ch06, Advanced
Topics.  Remove it from both ch04 and ch05.  Reorganize ch04
outline.  Put 'svn import examples' into the first section of ch05.

author: dwhedon
msg: Fix issue #881
Patch by: Daniele Nicolodi <daniele@grinta.net>
(Tweaked by Gustavo Niemeyer <niemeyer@conectiva.com> and me.)
* configure.in
Include support for --enable-all-static option.
* Makefile.in
Revert order of $(LT_LDFLAGS) $(CC), to $(LT_LDFLAGS) $(CC),
so that -all-static is received in the right place.
* INSTALL
Add note about the difference between --disable-shared and
--enable-all-static

author: gstein
msg: Shift some logic around and some minor cleanup.
* gen_base.py
(GeneratorBase.__init__): collect the test script stuff here, rather
than in the MakefileGenerator.
(GeneratorBase.compute_hdr_deps): new method to compute the header
dependencies. moved from MakefileGenerator.write_depends(). the
header deps are now written into the dep graph.
(dep_types): add DT_INCLUDE
(_scan_for_includes): use 'h' rather than match.group(1) again
* gen_make.py
(MakefileGenerator.write): remove some shortcut variables and just
refer to target_ob attributes instead. remove the test prog
collecting.
(MakefileGenerator.write_depends): call the new compute_hdr_deps()
method and then generate the full dependency output for object
files.

author: gstein
msg: More usage of the graph.
Note: we're switching to the graph, and front-loading it as much as
possible, so that the resulting deps can be shared by the makefile and
the DSP generators.
* gen_base.py
(GeneratorBase.__init__): no more file_deps. add dependencies for .o
files on their .c files, and link targets on the .o files. remove
self.inst_outputs and the code to fill it.
(dep_types): add comments for the types. rename DT_LIBRARY to DT_LINK
* gen_make.py
(MakefileGenerator.write): just pull the objects from the
dependencies for the target, rather than computing them. grab the
installation outputs from the DT_INSTALL target objects' output
instead of relying on the base class to monkey this data around
for us.
(MakefileGenerator.write_depends): get the objects and source files
from the graph rather than self.file_deps.

author: gstein
msg: Initial work on a general dependency graph.
* gen_base.py
(GeneratorBase.__init__): remove the 'install' instance variable.
add and use a DT_INSTALL dependency to the graph instead.
(class DependencyGraph): new class to record various dependencies
(dep_types): the known dependency types
(DT_*): symbolic constants for the types
* gen_make.py
(MakefileGenerator.write): use the graph rather than self.install
